project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line interface (CLI) contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file for persistence.

task.name: Implement the functionality to add contacts
Implement the functionality to search for contacts
Implement the functionality to update existing contacts
Implement the functionality to delete contacts
Implement the functionality to save contacts to a JSON file
Implement the functionality to load contacts from a JSON file
Implement command-line interface to interact with the user
Write tests for each of the features above, including adding, searching, updating, and deleting contacts
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
